item.title: 2021 Wrapped
item.description: I entered 2021 with lists and plans but life had plans of its own. I lost a loved one and everything changed. I’m still processing grief but if there is anything it has taught me is how short life is, how fragile, how impermanent. So, instead of chasing meaningless listicles, I chose to live and do more of what makes me happy. I ended up missing a few boxes and that’s okay.
